required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: The Accuracy of Brain Biological Electrical Impedance Tomography Screen for Supratentorial Tumors
clinical_study.official_title: A Prospective, Self-paired, Single-center Clinical Trial Evaluating the Accuracy of Brain Biological Electrical Impedance Tomography Screen for Supratentorial Tumors

lead_sponsor.agency: Second Affiliated Hospital, School of Medicine, Zhejiang University

clinical_study.source: Second Affiliated Hospital, School of Medicine, Zhejiang University

brief_summary.textblock:
Compared with MRI or CT, brain biological electrical impedance tomography were performed on patients with supratentorial tumors and healthy people . The AUC (area under the curve) of ROC, which is associated with the increased maximum and the difference between left and right equilibrium of impedance value, is calculated. The specificity of brain biological electrical impedance tomography in screening supratentorial tumors are evaluated.
To compare the changes of parameters detected by brain biological electrical impedance tomography, the enrolled brain tumor patients with cerebral edema were paired with themselves and intravenous infusion of mannitol so that the sensitivity of this device in monitoring cerebral edema can be evaluated.

detailed_description.textblock:
Compared with MRI or CT, brain biological electrical impedance tomography were performed on patients with supratentorial tumors and healthy people . The AUC (area under the curve) of ROC, which is associated with the increased maximum and the difference between left and right equilibrium of impedance value, is calculated. The specificity of brain biological electrical impedance tomography in screening supratentorial tumors are evaluated.
To compare the changes of parameters detected by brain biological electrical impedance tomography, the enrolled brain tumor patients with cerebral edema were paired with themselves and intravenous infusion of mannitol so that the sensitivity of this device in monitoring cerebral edema can be evaluated.

primary_outcome.measure: The AUC of ROC curve of the maximum increased value of impedance
primary_outcome.description: The AUC of ROC curve of the maximum increased value of impedance

secondary_outcome.measure: the difference between the left and right equilibrium
secondary_outcome.description: the difference between the left and right equilibrium

arm_group.arm_group_label: Patients examined with biological electrical impedance

intervention.description: Patients diagnosed with brain supratentorial tumors through MRI/CT are evaluated with brain biological electrical impedance tomography. And the brain biological electrical impedance tomography is used to monitor the cerebral edema situation of patients with brain edema
intervention.arm_group_label: Patients examined with biological electrical impedance

intervention.description: Patients diagnosed with brain supratentorial tumors through MRI/CT
